title: Moonrider Outpost
text: Raiders have begun fighting over disputed grain fields.
blocka: xxACTION Task (Rapport).
blockb: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 8 progress, discard threat, and gain 2 xxFOOD dice.
blockc: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 13 progress, burn threat, and gain 3 xxFOOD dice.
blockd: xxTRAP Spend 3 xxFOOD or lower Sunrider disposition by one.

title: Silk Roads
text: If you aren't building relationships - you will be left behind.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 3 Timber to place one progress.
blockb: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 3 progress, burn threat, and gain 2 xxFOOD dice.

title: Trade Agreement
blocka: xxACTION Spend two resource dice to initiate trade with a faction. Gain a number of new resource dice equal to the disposition of the faction. Dice gained and spent should match trade wheel for faction.

title: Development Research
blocka: xxACTION Purchase one available development. Shuffle into either player's asset draw pile.

title: Amber Lodge
blocka: xxACTION Task (Lore).
blockb: xxACTION Character spends 9 progress to remove one condition.

title: Strategic Investments
blocka: xxACTION Spend 5 xxFORTUNE to place one progress.
blockb: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 4 progress to increase any disposition track by one.
blockc: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 7 progress to increase any resource track by one.

title: Resource Gathering
blocka: xxACTION Test (Resource Track). Use value of resource track for test. For each success, gain one resource die of that type.

title: Hilltop Square
blocka: xxACTION Gain one Fortune.

title: Gray River
blocka: xxACTION Convert any number of xxTIMBER dice into the same number of xxFORTUNE dice.

title: Mirror Woods
blocka: xxACTION Task (Survival).
blockb: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 9 progress to increase xxTIMBER track by one.
blockc: xxSUN Test (Survival 2). Failure: All characters at this location are weary.

title: Exposed Overlook
blocka: xxACTION Task (Survival).
blocke: xxDOOM A fire breaks out! Lose all progress on this location.

title: Musty Tomb
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Lore.
blockb: xxTRAP Test (Lore 2). Failure: One character at this location is shaken.

title: Lush Fields
blocka: xxACTION Spend 4 xxFORTUNE to gain one xxFOOD die.
blockb: xxSUN If a character is at this location, gain three xxFOOD dice.

title: Salmon Run
blocka: xxACTION Task (Survival).
blockb: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 13 progress to raise xxFOOD track by one.
blockc: xxFORCEFUL One character at this location is weary.

title: The Weird Rock
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Lore.
blockb: xxDOOM Test (Lore 1). Failure: One character at this location is shaken.

title: Hogel Manor
blocka: xxACTION (Task Command).
blockb: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 10 progress to increase Sunrider Disposition track by one.

title: Horsethief Meadows
blocka: xxACTION Spend 3 xxFOOD to add progress equal to Tactics on any card with a Military tag.

title: Song Bluff
blocka: Effect: All characters increase their Tactics by Sunrider Disposition while at least one character is at this location.
blockb: xxSUN One character at this location is angry.

title: Maplewood
blocka: xxACTION Gain one xxTIMBER.

title: Spinner Lakes
blocka: xxACTION Spend 8 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Green Haven
blocka: Effect: All characters increase their Thievery by Gravewood disposition while at least one character is at this location.
blockb: xxTRAP One character at this location is angry.

title: First Haven
blocka: xxACTION Spend 3 xxLUXURY to discard one threat.

title: The Rosy Freetrader
blocka: xxACTION (Task Thievery).
blockb: xxIMMEDIATE Spend 12 progress to gain one xxSECRETS.
blockc: xxTRAP (Test Disguise 2). Failure: One character at this location is weary.

title: Map Hall
blocka: xxACTION Move one Graycloak to any Imperial location.

title: House of Cloves
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Disguise.
blockb: xxDOOM (Test Rapport 2). Failure: One character at this location is angry.
